name: Tracktastic
author: Killian Santos

sections.description:
Elevate your WooCommerce store to new heights with Tracktastic – the ultimate bridge between your WordPress site and Matomo’s e-commerce tracking. This free, powerful extension seamlessly syncs your WooCommerce events with Matomo, providing you with detailed insights and metrics to skyrocket your online business success.

Why Choose Tracktastic?
* Seamless Integration: Effortlessly connects your WooCommerce store with Matomo, ensuring that every e-commerce event is tracked meticulously.
* Data-Driven Decisions: Harness the full potential of Matomo’s analytics to make informed decisions and boost your sales.
* Universal Compatibility: Works flawlessly with all versions of Matomo, providing you with unparalleled flexibility.
* Zero Hassle Setup: Simply install and activate Tracktastic, and watch it work, its magic. No additional installation or complex setup required.
* Cost-Effective Solution: Completely free and designed to add value to your e-commerce journey without any hidden costs.

Elevate Your E-Commerce Experience
With Tracktastic, you’re not just running an online store; you’re mastering it. By providing detailed insights into customer behavior and store performance, Tracktastic empowers you to optimize your strategies and maximize your growth.

Don’t let valuable data slip through the cracks. Install Tracktastic today and start transforming your e-commerce data into actionable insights!

Ready to dive into a world of informed e-commerce decisions? Download Tracktastic now and take the first step towards data-driven success!
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.4
  • WordPress 6.0

Automatic Installation

  1. Log in to your WordPress admin dashboard.
  2. Navigate to the “Plugins” menu.
  3. Click on “Add New”.
  4. Search for “Tracktastic”.
  5. Click on “Install Now” and then on “Activate”.

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin.
  2. Upload it to your web server using an FTP application.

Once Installed

The plugin has no configuration screen, as no configuration is required. If Matomo tracking is set correctly and WooCommerce is activated, your sales statistics will appear in Matomo.
sections.faq:
Is this the official plugin proposed by the Matomo team?

No. This plugin is not developed by the team behind Matomo. It was developed by a user who needed a solution for tracking WooCommerce statistics with Matomo and decided to share his plugin with the WordPress community.

Does Tracktastic allow the installation of Matomo?

No, Tracktastic does not facilitate the installation of Matomo. It exclusively enables the e-commerce tracking functionality within your WooCommerce store for integration with an existing Matomo setup. We recommend setting up Matomo on your WordPress site with the SEOPress extension.

How do I activate Matomo’s e-commerce tracking with Tracktastic?

Activating e-commerce tracking is straightforward. Simply install and activate the Tracktastic extension on your WordPress site. Ensure you have the basic Matomo script already in place on your site, and Tracktastic will handle the rest.

Can I use Tracktastic without WooCommerce?

No, Tracktastic is specifically designed to collect and track e-commerce events from WooCommerce. Without WooCommerce, Tracktastic will not function as it relies on WooCommerce data for its operations.

Does Tracktastic work with Matomo On-Premise?

Yes, Tracktastic is compatible with both Matomo On-Premise and Matomo Cloud. It seamlessly integrates with your Matomo setup, regardless of whether it’s hosted on-premise or in the cloud.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Launch of the 1st public version of Tracktastic
